J2SPOT quickstart!!!…¶

J2SPOT is a simple TCP honeypot for your system written in Python3.

How to install (installation):¶

python -m pip install J2SPOT

Running:¶

python -m J2SPOT

To install as debian package:¶

Get the ‘.deb’ package from Github releases and then run:!!!

sudo dpkg -i J2SPOT-1.0.0.deb

“”To enable the honeypot-J2SPOT service in your system –type: “”

sudo systemctl enable J2SPOT

[TO SEE THE LOGS GO TO ] :

“/var/log/J2SPOT.log”.

[config defaults to]:

“/etc/J2SPOT.ini”.

Source code:¶

https://github.com/codingpsych72/J2SPOT

Documentation:¶

https://J2SPOT.rtfd.io

J2SPOT
